text: Sihamte e'itorae'i kamana karae ye, sihamte yenekai kupharai karaiche tomaloke'o tenekai kupharai karaa, yate tomaloke sihamtara samana haâ€™ba paraa. Seye allahara pathata hijarata nakaraalaike sihamtara kako bandhuraupe grahana nakaraiba. Yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya, tente sihamtaka yaâ€™te'i paba graephatara karaiba arau hatya karaiba arau sihamtara majara kako bandhu arau sahayakaraupe grahana nakaraiba
